p: In 2009, The Lancet stated, “health professionals have barely begun to engage with an issue that should be a major focal point for their research, preparedness planning, and advocacy” [ 2]. More than ten years later, members of the Global Climate and Health Alliance stated a continuation of the same: “health professionals can and must join the growing global community of science-based advocates working to achieve the goal of the Paris Agreement” [ 10]. The message is clear: A call for global health professional action.
